entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
